name: Layers of Defence
description:
Tower Defense. Build your own custom towers to fit your play style! Express yourself and your style with unique towers that look like you want them to look. ONE HUNDRED AND TWENTY FIVE POSSIBLE COMBOS! Also infinite colors(or well...you know however many are in the RGB range). Soooo many combos of tower abilities.

PS. If you click on the tower block while customizing your towers, you can changed the colors of each block.

WARNING: Linux and Mac builds are 1000% untested, so yea. Any comments on if it actually works would be great!

Music by the amazing Kevin MacLeod
